column2:
'Yes'
'? Tip'
'The compute instance has 120GB OS disk. If you run out of disk space, use the'
'terminal to clear at least 1-2 GB efore you stop or restart the compute instance.'
'Compute targets for inference'
'When performing inference, Azure Machine Learning creates a Docker container that'
'hosts the model and associated resources needed to use it. This container is then used'
'in a compute target.'
'The compute target you use to host your model will affect the cost and availaility of'
'your deployed endpoint. Use this tale to choose an appropriate compute target.'
'Compute target Used for'
'GPU'
'support'
'Description'
